# API

## Tools

To run `lemur` use the following call.

```{eval-rst}
.. module:: pylemur.tl
.. currentmodule:: pylemur

.. autosummary::
    :toctree: generated

    pylemur.tl.lemur
    pylemur.tl.align_with_harmony
    pylemur.tl.align_with_grouping
    pylemur.tl.predict
    pylemur.tl.cond
```
